description.value:
You can jury-rig solutions when you don't have the proper tools on hand. You can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Repair]{Repair} damaged items without a repair kit.

If you have the raw materials available, you can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Craft]{Craft} a basic @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Caltrops]{Caltrop} set, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Candle]{Candle}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Compass]{Compass}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Crowbar]{Crowbar}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Fishing Tackle]{Fishing Tackle}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Flint and Steel]{Flint and Steel}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Hammer]{Hammer}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Ladder (10-foot)]{Ladder}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Piton]{Piton}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Rope]{Rope}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Ten-Foot Pole]{Ten-Foot Pole}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Thieves' Tools (Replacement Picks)]{Replacement Thieves Picks}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Tool (Long)]{Long Tool} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Tool (Short)]{Short Tool}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Torch]{Torch} without consulting a basic crafter's book.
